title: KOE: Knowledgecenter Open Education
text:
Methodology & Statistics, Utrecht University 
This project is funded from the 2022 FUSO round within the School of Social and Behavioural Sciences. The project proposal (in Dutch) can be found here.

About
KOE focuses on the form of education: so-called Open Educational Materials (OEM). OEM can be defined as materials that are shared conform the FAIR principles.
See this presentation for a brief introduction of the KOE project.


Contact
If you’d like to get into contact, please fill in our contact form (log in with your UU e-mail address to access).



Examples
Some examples of Open Educational Materials (OEM) developed at the Faculty of Social and Behavioural Sciences, Utrecht University :

Youtube lectures under open licence
Materials for Supervised Learning and Visualization and the corresponding course page
Materials for Markup Languages and Reproducible Programming in Statistics and the corresponding course page and student repository
Knowledge clips M&S
Course page for Theory Construction and Statistical Modeling
Course page for Battling the curse of dimensionality
Course page for Applied Data Analysis and Visualization
Youtube lectures for Practicum Data Analyse
